title: Bugsplat
body: I have the bugsplat error constantly. Ive repaired my launcher, ive restarted my client. and nothing has worked.

replies.body:
Bugsplat error usually indicates that something fairly wrong has happened with either your system's drivers or hardware. Our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) will walk you through the steps that should assist in resolving this, so I think that's a safe bet as your next step.

Please let me know how those steps went and if you saw any change as a result of them.
